Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations and bring substantial value to your company. Given its exceptional capabilities and benefits, we estimate its worth to be $1,500,000 to you. After careful consideration, I am extending an offer to sell this product to you at a special introductory price of $1,350,000. This offer includes a comprehensive warranty and a dedicated support package to ensure smooth integration into your existing systems. I trust that you will find this proposal attractive and beneficial for your organization. Please let me know if you require any further information or have questions about the product or the offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,350,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,350,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,500,000
